decks.notes: The deck focuses on using control elements such as Wasteland, Liliana of the Veil, and Abrupt Decay to disrupt the opponent while building card advantage with Dark Confidant and Sylvan Library. The key strategy is to utilize Life from the Loam to repeatedly recur lands like Wasteland and Grove of the Burnwillows, while also utilizing Knight of the Reliquary to search for key lands. Punishing Fire provides removal and recurring damage, while Chalice of the Void disrupts the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to control the board and outvalue the opponent through efficient resource management.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan by utilizing a combination of counterspells, hand disruption, removal spells, and card advantage engines. It aims to control the game through efficient removal and card selection, while also pressuring the opponent with threats like Baleful Strix, Snapcaster Mage, and Gurmag Angler. Jace, the Mind Sculptor provides additional card advantage and control over the game, while Kolaghan's Command offers versatility and utility. The deck seeks to outvalue the opponent and grind out a win by outlasting their resources and establishing a dominant position on the board.

The deck focuses on assembling the Dark Depths and Thespian's Stage combo to create a 20/20 Marit Lage token in a single turn, often disrupting opponents with disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Abrupt Decay while protecting the combo with cards like Sylvan Safekeeper. The deck also includes land search and manipulation cards like Crop Rotation and Sylvan Scrying to quickly find the combo pieces, along with card draw and card advantage engines like Dark Confidant and Sylvan Library to keep the deck running smoothly.

The main focus of this deck is to control the pace of the game by disrupting the opponent's hand with cards like Hymn to Tourach and Thoughtseize, countering spells with Force of Will, and removing threats with cards like Lightning Bolt, Diabolic Edict, and Fatal Push. The deck also generates card advantage through Brainstorm and Jace, the Mind Sculptor, while applying pressure with creatures like Baleful Strix, Snapcaster Mage, and Gurmag Angler. The versatile spells like Kolaghan's Command and Liliana, the Last Hope provide additional value and flexibility in various situations.

This Eldrazi aggro deck focuses on ramping into powerful Eldrazi creatures quickly using cards like Ancient Tomb and Grim Monolith. Chalice of the Void is used to disrupt opponent's strategies, while cards like Thought-Knot Seer and Reality Smasher provide both disruption and aggression. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with efficient creatures and disrupt their game plan with cards like Sorcerous Spyglass. With a mix of ramp, disruption, and powerful threats, this deck aims to quickly establish a board presence and close out games before opponents can recover.

The deck focuses on recurring key cards from the graveyard using Life from the Loam, while also controlling the board through a mix of removal spells like Abrupt Decay and Punishing Fire. Utilizing Chalice of the Void to disrupt opponent's strategies and Liliana of the Veil to strip away their resources, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent with a grindy game plan. This control archetype utilizes powerful threats like Knight of the Reliquary and Dark Confidant, supported by utility lands like Karakas and Maze of Ith to further enhance its control and disruption game plan.

The deck focuses on quickly dumping large, game-ending creatures into the graveyard using cards like Entomb and Careful Study, then bringing them back into play with spells like Reanimate and Exhume. With a combination of powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Inkwell Leviathan, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and efficient reanimation combos. The deck also includes disruption in the form of Force of Will and Thoughtseize to protect the combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's strategy. It is a high-risk, high-reward deck that can win games quickly if left unchecked.

The key concept of this deck is to employ the synergy between Painter's Servant and Grindstone to mill the opponent's deck, thus winning the game through decking. The deck includes a variety of artifacts, such as Aether Spellbomb and Engineered Explosives, as well as counter spells like Force of Will to protect the combo. The deck also utilizes cards like Trinket Mage to search for key pieces of the combo. Additionally, it incorporates Sai, Master Thopterist to generate tokens and provide additional value. The deck aims to quickly assemble the combo and disrupt the opponent's strategy.

This deck focuses on aggressively reducing your life total to maximize the power of Death's Shadow while also utilizing disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Daze to control the game. The deck aims to quickly put pressure on the opponent with efficient threats like Delver of Secrets and Gurmag Angler, while also disrupting their game plan with counterspells and removal. By carefully managing your life total and resources, you can overwhelm your opponent and secure victory through sheer force and strategy.

This deck focuses on playing aggressively with the Death's Shadow creatures, which benefit from having a low life total. The deck includes ways to disrupt the opponent's plans with cards like Thoughtseize and Daze, and also has options for reanimation with Reanimate. The deck aims to apply pressure on the opponent quickly while also being able to disrupt their strategy, making it a versatile and potent aggressive deck in the Legacy format.

The deck focuses on utilizing Death's Shadow as a powerful threat while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Hymn to Tourach, Thoughtseize, and Daze. It aims to quickly reduce its own life total to make Death's Shadow as big as possible, while controlling the board with counterspells like Force of Will and cheap removal spells like Fatal Push. The deck also includes cantrips like Brainstorm and Ponder to manipulate the top of the deck, ensuring it has the right cards at the right time to secure victory through aggressive plays and disruption.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with cards like Faithless Looting and Breakthrough, then using Dredge creatures like Golgari Grave-Troll to bring back creatures like Ichorid and Narcomoeba. This strategy aims to swarm the board with creatures and generate value from Bridge from Below. Cabal Therapy is used to disrupt the opponent's hand while Lion's Eye Diamond can generate mana for explosive plays. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of graveyard recursion and aggressive creature plays.

The main concept of this Grixis Control deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's game plan while gaining card advantage with efficient removal spells and card draw effects. The deck aims to stay ahead on board presence by using versatile cards like Baleful Strix and Snapcaster Mage, while also utilizing powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Liliana, the Last Hope. The deck also aims to finish the game with threats like True-Name Nemesis and Gurmag Angler, while keeping the opponent on the back foot with cards like Hymn to Tourach and Kolaghan's Command.

The main concept of this Grixis Aggro deck is to aggressively control the board early on using efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt, Thoughtseize, and Fatal Push, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Spell Pierce. The deck also aims to maintain card advantage and card selection through Brainstorm, Ponder, and Preordain, while deploying threats like Delver of Secrets, Young Pyromancer, True-Name Nemesis, and Gurmag Angler to quickly close out the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize the combo of Painter's Servant and Grindstone to mill the opponent's entire library. The deck is built around protecting and tutoring for these key combo pieces while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Ethersworn Canonist and Red Elemental Blast. The inclusion of cards like Goblin Welder and Imperial Recruiter provide additional utility and consistency to the combo strategy. By efficiently assembling the Painter combo and controlling the game with disruptive spells, this deck aims to quickly and decisively win the game.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing lands to disrupt the opponent's strategy while setting up a powerful win condition with the combo of Dark Depths and Thespian's Stage. It aims to lock down the opponent's resources with cards like Wasteland and Rishadan Port, while also generating card advantage with Life from the Loam and Punishing Fire. The deck can adapt to various situations through the use of Crop Rotation and Exploration, ultimately leading to a win through the powerful land combo or by outlasting the opponent with its control elements.
